title: MASSIVE SIEGE EVENT - Mount and Blade: Warband Gameplay
description:
Mount and Blade Gameplay - Welcome to Call to Arms, a project that lionheart and I have been working on for quite sometime.  We host massive events on Mount and Blade and command our subscribers to victory!  In today's event we are playing siege where we attack and defend!  It is a best out of 3!  Enjoy the video :D

Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559

Call to Arms Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/calltoarmsmountandblade
Email: calltoarmsmountandblade@gmail.com 

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/CallToArms14

Youtubers who helped: 
Lionheart: https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10
Total Legion: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChQDqgNuz5JnAMr4uZlLE4Q
Heph: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/Hephaestionn
If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
